name: In The Line Of Duty
description:
In the line of duty is a 3D single-player adventure game about the lives of different working dogs. 
This is a  teaser for the game. This scenario starts with ava, an avalanche rescue golden retriever. Follow the scent trails to find the survivors using WASD, shift for sprint,  and the space bar for jump. Follow the scent trail back to camp to then find other scent trails leading to other survivors. Have Fun finding 3 survivors hidden in the mountains.
